Title: Relates to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Lance Cpl. Scott Lee Schultz Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a bridge on state Route 22, crossing over interstate eighty-seven in the town of Chesterfield, county of Essex as the "Lance Cpl. Scott Lee Schultz Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Lance Cpl. Scott Lee Schultz Memorial Bridge"
